top_comments_top.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
The enemy of your enemy is not always your friend.
No one needs any help to link Glenn Youngkin to racists.

So why should I be shocked at this?  For one, it was a Republican group behind it.  For two, they dressed as a group of Republican supporters.  Am I supposed to believe the Republican "ah-HA"s are now genuine, after they spent four years lying in bed with tiki torch types?  Republicans, this IS your party's reflection staring back in the mirror.  You can't distance yourselves from it when it is convenient, not after your cult leader declared there were many fine people on both sides in Charlottesville, and you nodded your heads and kept waving his flag.

So... right-wingers doing what right-wingers do then? But I'm sure this will be used as an implication to prove beyond all doubt that Democrats and THE LEFT/antifa/socialist/communist are actually doing this and that everything bad the right does is actually somehow the left even when the right are very proud of what is being done but it's totally antifa just trying to set them up.
